title: FS: T206 PSA HOFers, Cycle, Titus, SLers, EPDG, AB, etc.

posts.post_title: FS: T206 PSA HOFers, Cycle, Titus, SLers, EPDG, AB, etc.
posts.post_content:
Ames (Hands Over Head) EPDG PSA 4.5 = $350
Bay Old Mill PSA 3 = $300
Collins American Beauty (w/ Frame) PSA 1 (mc) = $360
Huggins (Hands at Mouth) Cycle PSA 2 = $325
Ryan PSA 3 = $300
Sharpe Cycle PSA 3 = $300
Shaw PB PSA 4 = $115
Stovall (Portrait) PSA 2.5 = $80
Titus Polar Bear PSA 3.5 = SOLD!
Turner PSA 3 = $85

Thanks for taking a look!  Please add $3 for all orders.
Hey bud- Im looking for a low grade T205 Cleveland player for my type card collection- nothing expensive...have anything that I might like?

Well, poop!  I jumped the gun on that guys!  I have a stack of SGC graded cards still to list that includes a scrap Jennings.  I have an autographed Doyle SGC and some other stuff.  

Sorry, Ed, no T205 Indians.

PM Sent on Titus PB.

Matt
